name: netscaler-adc
label: NetScaler ADC
description: The NetScaler appliance is an application switch which performs application-specific traffic analysis to intelligently distribute, optimize, and secure Layer 4-Layer 7 (L4â€“L7) network traffic for web applications.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: IP address or hostname of the NetScaler server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: IP address or hostname of the NetScaler server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Token that is generated through the NetScaler server
fields.description: Specify the API Token that is generated through the NetScaler server

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create NetScaler ACL Resource
operations.description: Creates a new NetScaler ACL(Access Control List) entry resource in your NetScaler server based on the parameters provided

parameters.title: ACL Name
parameters.name: aclname
parameters.description: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule

parameters.title: ACL Action
parameters.name: aclaction
parameters.tooltip: Specify the action to perform on incoming IPv4 packets that match the extended ACL rule
parameters.description: Specify the action to perform on incoming IPv4 packets that match the extended ACL rule

parameters.title: Source IP
parameters.name: srcip
parameters.description: Specify the IP address or range of IP addresses to match against the source IP address of an incoming IPv4 packet
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address or range of IP addresses to match against the source IP address of an incoming IPv4 packet

parameters.title: Destination IP
parameters.name: destip
parameters.description: Specify the IP address or range of IP addresses to match against the destination IP address of an incoming IPv4 packet
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address or range of IP addresses to match against the destination IP address of an incoming IPv4 packet

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to NetScaler REST API Documentation. https://developer-docs.netscaler.com/en-us/adc-nitro-api/current-release/configuration/ns/nsacl.html
parameters.description: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to NetScaler REST API Documentation. https://developer-docs.netscaler.com/en-us/adc-nitro-api/current-release/configuration/ns/nsacl.html
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Get NetScaler ACL Resource
operations.description: Retrieves NetScaler ACL(Access Control List) entry resource in your NetScaler server based on the parameters provided

parameters.title: ACL Name
parameters.name: aclname
parameters.description: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule that you want to retrieve. By default all ACL will be fetched
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule that you want to retrieve. By default all ACL will be fetched

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Number of results to return per page.
parameters.description: Specify the Number of results to return per page.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: pageno
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number of results to be fetched
parameters.description: Specify the page number of results to be fetched

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to NetScaler REST API Documentation. https://developer-docs.netscaler.com/en-us/adc-nitro-api/current-release/configuration/ns/nsacl.html
parameters.description: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to NetScaler REST API Documentation. https://developer-docs.netscaler.com/en-us/adc-nitro-api/current-release/configuration/ns/nsacl.html
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Delete NetScaler ACL Resource
operations.description: Deletes NetScaler ACL(Access Control List) entry resource in your NetScaler server based on the parameters provided

parameters.title: ACL Name
parameters.name: aclname
parameters.description: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule that you want to delete
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule that you want to delete

operations.title: Delete NetScaler ACL Resource
operations.description: Deletes NetScaler ACL(Access Control List) entry resource in your NetScaler server based on the parameters provided

parameters.title: ACL Name
parameters.name: aclname
parameters.description: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule that you want to delete
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule that you want to delete

operations.title: Change NetScaler ACL Resource State
operations.description: Changes NetScaler ACL(Access Control List) entry resource state(Enable/Disable) in your NetScaler server based on the parameters provided

parameters.title: ACL Name
parameters.name: aclname
parameters.description: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule that you want to delete
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Name for the extended ACL rule that you want to delete

parameters.title: Action
parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Specify the Action for the extended ACL rule to apply
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Action for the extended ACL rule to apply
